reviewtext: not much to say. It was good while it lasted. Vista began acting weird until it wouldn't boot anymore. Luckily I have two more hard drives, a 160 gb seagate and a 40 gb western digital ( I kept this one from the first computer I ever bought like 10 years ago and it still works!!). I've been reading a lot of negative reviews about seagate hard drives and with my experience I will not buy another seagate drive ever again.
